last_episode_to_air.name: The Past Is Outside, The Future Is in Here
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shaken by Cleo's confession, Miranda wonders who she really is. The family begins to unravel under the weight of all the secrets from the past.

name: Lady Voyeur
overview: A talented, voyeuristic hacker finds herself thrust into a dangerous investigation after her sex worker neighbor leaves for a weekend trip.

episodes.name: The Year I Lived Two Lives
episodes.overview: Miranda watches Cléo entertain a customer. When Cléo decides to go away for the weekend, Miranda agrees to take care of her little dog.

episodes.name: Every Action Has a Reaction
episodes.overview: Cleo turns to Miranda for help, but a bunch of different problems start popping up. Diana tells Fernando the truth about Luísa.

episodes.name: Fragmented
episodes.overview: Miranda manages to get away, but her memories of what happened the night before are pretty vague. Detective Inês investigates what happened to Diana.

episodes.name: The Perfect Lie
episodes.overview: Miranda discovers a secret about Diana's past. Zoe's behavior puts her in the sights of Detective Inês and Miranda.

episodes.name: Crime and Punishment
episodes.overview: Detective Inês investigates Helena. Miranda begins to suspect that Heitor is involved in Cleo's disappearance. Zoe resorts to blackmail.

episodes.name: Shadows of the Past
episodes.overview: After being questioned by Detective Inês, Miranda helps Luísa. Authorities identify a new suspect in Diana's case.

episodes.name: She's Among Us
episodes.overview: Rafael fights with Heitor and Miranda is worried about Rita, who could be in danger. Vitória shocks the family with an unexpected revelation.

episodes.name: Rock Bottom Is the Hottest Place
episodes.overview: Detective Inês interrogates Cléo. Miranda suspects that Fernando is up to something. A new inspector joins the investigation.

episodes.name: Going, Going... Gone!
episodes.overview: After opening up to Detective Inês, Miranda does everything to discover the truth about Heitor. Luísa and Vinícius run away together.

episodes.name: The Past Is Outside, The Future Is in Here
episodes.overview: Shaken by Cleo's confession, Miranda wonders who she really is. The family begins to unravel under the weight of all the secrets from the past.
